mapper.select: WITH latest_comments AS ( SELECT b.genre_id, b.book_id, MAX(s.date) as max_date FROM study_log s JOIN book b ON s.book_id = b.book_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY b.genre_id, b.book_id ), time_sum AS ( SELECT b.genre_id, CAST(SUM(s.time) AS DECIMAL(65, 1)) as sum_of_time FROM study_log s JOIN book b ON s.book_id = b.book_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY b.genre_id ) SELECT g.genre_name, g.genre_id, ts.sum_of_time, MAX(sl.comment) as comment, MAX(lc.max_date) as last_date FROM genre g JOIN book b ON g.genre_id = b.genre_id JOIN time_sum ts ON g.genre_id = ts.genre_id JOIN latest_comments lc ON b.genre_id = lc.genre_id JOIN study_log sl ON lc.book_id = sl.book_id AND lc.max_date = sl.date GROUP BY g.genre_name, g.genre_id, ts.sum_of_time ORDER BY last_date DESC;

WITH latest_comments AS ( SELECT book_id, MAX(date) as last_date FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY book_id ), time_sum AS ( SELECT book_id, CAST(SUM(time) AS DECIMAL(65, 1)) as sum_of_time FROM study_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY book_id ) SELECT g.genre_id, g.genre_name, SUM(ts.sum_of_time) as sum_of_time, MAX(lc.last_date) as last_date, GROUP_CONCAT((SELECT comment FROM study_log WHERE book_id = b.book_id AND date = lc.last_date) ORDER BY lc.last_date DESC SEPARATOR '; ') as comment FROM genre g JOIN book b ON g.genre_id = b.genre_id JOIN time_sum ts ON b.book_id = ts.book_id JOIN latest_comments lc ON b.book_id = lc.book_id GROUP BY g.genre_id ORDER BY last_date DESC;

SELECT b.book_name, g.genre_name, b.author, CAST(s.time AS DECIMAL(65, 1)) as time, s.date FROM study_log s JOIN book b ON s.book_id = b.book_id JOIN genre g ON b.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND b.genre_id = #{genreId} GROUP BY b.book_name, g.genre_name, b.author, s.date, s.time ORDER BY s.date;
